title: Can we remove crit items, runes, and masteries?
body: Dodge was removed because a champion that had 1 life could get under turret and take a final shot to the face only to have that 1% dodge chance kick in and stop the death. So I ask why is crit allowed in the game? When fighting one on one looking at how much hp you are losing, seeing that you have the advantage and will win only to have that 1% crit chance kick one auto away isn't really fair.
